New Album "Wow That Is A Lot Of Blood"

My new album, “Wow That Is A Lot Of Blood” has been a long time coming. It captures an emotion I experience a lot with my day job and I hope the music transmits that experience to you. It has been a long jouney but I am really glad that all of my loyal fans can hear it.

Although better known for my detective skills, my true passion is writing death metal songs. This website is my blog I use to verbalize my musical journey. Any bugs or issues with the website are purposeful and meant as a challenge for you to use your detective skills.
